name: I, For One, Welcome Our New Lady Knight Overlords!
name_original: I, For One, Welcome Our New Lady Knight Overlords!
description:
Blanche Smythe is a blacksmith in the town of Violetdale, which is currently overrun by knights of an invading kingdom. But Blanche actually doesn't mind at all, because all of the knights are gorgeous ladies! 😍✨

Play as Blanche as she tries to correctly repair the knights' weapons, while also attempting to successfully flirt with them!

I, For One, Welcome Our New Lady Knight Overlords is a Bitsy/Twine hybrid made in 48 hours for the 2020 Global Game Jam (Theme: Repair)

Title art by Ebeth | Title text by Jillian Stiles

Further credits within the game.
